mapper.insert: MERGE INTO report USING DUAL ON (r_id = #{r_id}) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET r_type = #{r_type}, r_content = #{r_content}, r_editor = #{m_id}, r_editdate = TO_CHAR(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (r_id, r_category, r_type, r_target, m_id, r_subject, r_date, r_content, r_state, r_reply, r_editor, r_editdate) VALUES( (LPAD(REPORT_SEQ.NEXTVAL, 6,'0')), #{r_category}, #{r_type}, #{r_target}, #{m_id}, #{r_subject}, TO_CHAR(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), #{r_content}, '10', '', #{m_id}, TO_CHAR(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM( SELECT r_id, (SELECT g_name FROM code_group WHERE g_id like r_category)r_category, (SELECT gc_name FROM common_code WHERE g_id like r_category AND gc_id like r_type)r_type, r_subject, r_date, r_content, r_target, (SELECT gc_name FROM common_code WHERE g_id like '003' AND gc_id like r_state)r_state, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY r_id DESC) ROWNUMBER, r_reply FROM report WHERE m_id like #{m_id}) WHERE ROWNUMBER BETWEEN #{startIndex} AND #{endIndex} ORDER BY r_id desc

SELECT r_id, (SELECT g_name FROM code_group WHERE g_id like #{r_category})r_category, (SELECT gc_name FROM common_code WHERE g_id like #{r_category} AND gc_id like r_type)r_type, r_subject, r_date, (r_type)r_type_id, REPLACE(r_content, CHR(13)||CHR(10), '')r_content, (SELECT gc_name FROM common_code WHERE g_id like '003' AND gc_id like r_state)r_state, m_id, REPLACE(r_reply, CHR(13)||CHR(10), '')r_reply FROM report WHERE r_id like #{r_id} ORDER BY r_id desc
